item.title: New version: system/google-cloud-sdk version 448.0.0
item.description: Command-line interface for Google Cloud Platform products and services.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/dua-cli version 2.20.1
item.description: dua (-> Disk Usage Analyzer) is a tool to conveniently learn about the usage of disk space of a given directory.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/polymake version 4.10
item.description: polymake is open source software for research in polyhedral geometry.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/groff version 1.23.0
item.description: groff (GNU roff) is a typesetting system that reads plain text input files that include formatting commands to produce output in PostScript, PDF, HTML, or DVI formats or for display to a terminal.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/flint version 2.9.0
item.description: FLINT is a C library for doing number theory.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/bliss version 0.73
item.description: A tool for computing automorphism groups and canonical forms of graphs.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/perl version 5.36.1
item.description: Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over 29 years of development.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/zfp version 1.0.0
item.description: zfp is an open-source library for compressed floating-point and integer arrays that support high throughput read and write random access.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/nextflow version 23.04.3
item.description: Nextflow is a bioinformatics workflow manager that enables the development of portable and reproducible workflows.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/rust version 1.72.0
item.description: A language empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software.
item.author: mthartma@stanford.edu (Mike Hartman)

item.title: New module: biology/dorado version 0.3.4
item.description: Dorado is a high-performance, easy-to-use, open source basecaller for Oxford Nanopore reads.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/ncbi-vdb version 3.0.7
item.description: NCBI VDB is the database engine used by NCBI SRA tools.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/dotnet version 6.0.413
item.description: .NET is a free, cross-platform, open source developer platform for building many different types of applications.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/shapeit version 4.2.2
item.description: SHAPEIT4 is a fast and accurate method for estimation of haplotypes (aka phasing) for SNP array and high coverage sequencing data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/sra-tools version 3.0.7
item.description: The SRA Toolkit and SDK from NCBI is a collection of tools and libraries for using data in the INSDC Sequence Read Archives.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/freesurfer version 7.4.1
item.description: An open source software suite for processing and analyzing (human) brain MRI images.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/mathematica version 13.1.0
item.description: A symbolic language and platform for modern technical computing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/jansson version 2.13.1
item.description: C library for encoding, decoding and manipulating JSON data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: physics/swash version 9.01a
item.description: SWASH (an acronym of Simulating WAves till SHore) is a non-hydrostatic wave-flow model.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-vcf2gwas version 0.8.9_py39
item.description: Python API for comprehensive GWAS analysis using GEMMA.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/gemma version 0.98.5
item.description: GEMMA is a software toolkit for fast application of linear mixed models (LMMs) and related models to genome-wide association studies (GWAS) and other large-scale data sets.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
